page.title: 15Pedal Bikes
page.content: We ride our{pedal bikes}up and down the scramble track, doing free-style over the jumps and dips. A jump is usually made from 2 tyres and a plank of wood. Each stunt that you can do has its own special name. A{Wheelie}is pulling up your front wheel and riding on the back wheel. A{Bunny Hop}is when both wheels of the bike leave the ground and an{American Bunny Hop}is when the front wheel leaves the ground before the back wheel. To do an{Endo you pull on your front brake so that your back wheel leaves the ground but your front wheel must not; you have to be very careful when trying this stunt or you will go over your handle bars and hurt yourself. There are special stunt bikes called {BMXs}but you can do the stunts with an ordinary bike.
